function.name: ActorCount
function.title: Actor Count
function.tip: Get the total number of actors currently active

argument.title: Actor
argument.tip: Select the actor to be counted

function.name: SendActivationEvent
function.title: Send Activation Event
function.tip: Send an Activation Event to selected actor

argument.title: Actor
argument.tip: Select the actor to receive the activation event

function.name: abs
function.title: Absolute Value
function.tip: Returns the absolute (positive) value of its argument

function.name: acos
function.title: Arc Cosine Function
function.tip: Calculates the arc cosine of given value

function.name: actor_to_screen
function.title: Actor to Screen
function.tip: Convert from current actor coordinates to screen coordinates

function.name: asin
function.title: Arc Sine Function
function.tip: Calculates the arc sine of given value

function.name: atan
function.title: Arc Tangent Function
function.tip: Calculates the arc tangent of given value

function.name: atan2
function.title: Arc Tangent Function 2
function.tip: Calculates the arc tangent of Value1/Value2. If Value2 is 0, atan2 returns 0. If both parameters of atan2 are 0, the function returns 0.

function.name: atof
function.title: Strings to Double
function.tip: Convert a string to real number

function.name: atoi
function.title: String to Integer
function.tip: Convert a string to integer number

function.name: atol
function.title: String to Long Integer
function.tip: Convert a string to long integer number

function.name: ceil
function.title: Ceiling of a Value
function.tip: The ceil function returns a value representing the smallest integer that is greater than or equal to given value

function.name: cos
function.title: Cosine Function
function.tip: Calculates the cosine of given value

function.name: cosh
function.title: Hyperbolic Cosine Function
function.tip: Calculates the hyperbolic cosine of given value

function.name: degtorad
function.title: Degrees to Radians
function.tip: Convert an angle from degrees to radians

function.name: direction
function.title: Direction Between Points
function.tip: Calculates the direction between points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) (in degrees, 0 to 360, from positive x axis, counterclockwise, in degrees).

argument.title: Point 1 x
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the x value for first point

argument.title: y
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the y value for first point

argument.title: Point 2 x
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the x value for second point

argument.title: y
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the y value for second point

function.name: distance
function.title: Distance Between Points
function.tip: Returns the distance between points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).

argument.title: Point 1 x
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the x value for first point

argument.title: y
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the y value for first point

argument.title: Point 2 x
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the x value for second point

argument.title: y
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the y value for second point

function.name: draw_from
function.title: Draw From
function.tip: Draw the current image of an actor into a canvas actor.

argument.title: Actor
argument.tip: Select the actor to get the image

argument.title: scale
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the scale of the image

function.name: erase
function.title: Erase Canvas
function.tip: Erase the canvas actor with specified color and transparency

function.name: fclose
function.title: Close File
function.tip: Close the selected file. The file must be opened with Open File.

argument.title: File
argument.tip: Select the file to be closed

function.name: feof
function.title: End of File
function.tip: Tests for end-of-file. Returns 0 if the current position is not end of file.

function.name: fgetc
function.title: Read Character
function.tip: Get a character from a file

function.name: fgets
function.title: Read String
function.tip: Reads a string from the selected file. Reads from current file position until Maximum-1 character are read, or a newline character is read, or the end-of-file is encountered, whichever comes first. The newline character, if read, is included in the string.

argument.title: Store string
argument.errorMsg: Please, select a variable to store the read string

argument.title: Maximum
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the maximum number of characters to read

function.name: floor
function.title: Floor of a Value
function.tip: The floor function returns a value representing the largest integer that is less than or equal to given value

function.name: fmod
function.title: Division Remainder Value
function.tip: Calculates the remider value of Value1/Value2 division

function.name: fopen
function.title: Open File
function.tip: Open or create a file

argument.title: Mode
argument.tip: Creation mode. Use binary modes to handle files that store data other than plain text

option.name: Create a new text file for reading and writing
Opens a existing text file for reading and writing
Create a new binary file for reading and writing
Opens a existing binary file for reading and writing
Opens or create for writing at the end of the text file
Opens or create for writing at the end of the binary file

function.name: fprintf1
function.title: Write Formatted String
function.tip: Write a formatted string in the selected file

function.name: fputc
function.title: Write Character
function.tip: Write a character to a file

function.name: fputs
function.title: Write String
function.tip: Write a string to a file

function.name: fseek
function.title: Set File Position
function.tip: Moves the file position to a specified location.

argument.title: Relative to
argument.tip: Select the relative position to set the new position

function.name: ftell
function.title: Get Current File Position
function.tip: Returns the current file position relative to beginning of file

function.name: getAnimIndex
function.title: Get Animation Index
function.tip: Returns the index of an animation in the current Event Actor. Returns -1 on error.

argument.title: Animation
argument.tip: Select the animation to get the index

function.name: getAnimName
function.title: Get Animation Name
function.tip: Returns the name of an animation in the current Event Actor. Returns an empty string on error.

function.name: getAnimName2
function.title: Get Animation Name 2
function.tip: Returns the name of an animation in a specified actor. Returns an empty string on error.

function.name: getKeyText
function.title: Get Key Description
function.tip: Returns the key description for a given key code

function.name: getLastKey
function.title: Get Last Pressed Key
function.tip: Returns the key code for the last pressed key

function.name: getactor
function.title: Get Actor at Position
function.tip: Returns Actor at position (x,y) (in game coordinates) if success, invalid Actor (with cloneindex = -1 and name = invalid Actor) on error.

argument.title: x
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the x value for the actor coordinate

argument.title: y
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the y value for the actor coordinate

function.name: getclone
function.title: Get Clone Actor
function.tip: Returns the Actor with given clone name or invalid Actor (with cloneindex = -1 and name = invalid Actor) on error

argument.title: Actor
argument.tip: Select the actor to be counted

function.name: getclone2
function.title: Get Clone Actor 2
function.tip: Returns the Actor with given name and clone index or invalid Actor (with cloneindex = -1 and name = invalid Actor) on error

argument.title: Actor
argument.tip: Select the actor to be counted

function.name: lineto
function.title: Draw Line To
function.tip: Draw a line on current Event Actor from last point to the given point using current pen. The current Event Actor must be a canvas actor.

function.name: loadVars
function.title: Load Variables
function.tip: Load all variables in the group from a specified file

argument.title: Group
argument.tip: Select a group previously created in the User Variable panel

function.name: log
function.title: Natural Logarithm
function.tip: Calculates the natural logarithm of given value

function.name: log10
function.title: Base 10 Logarithm
function.tip: Calculates the base 10 logarithm of given value

function.name: LoadGame
function.title: Load Game
function.tip:
Load a new game from the current game directory.
Game file: Enter the game ged file.
Load game will load the given ged file or .exe or .dat file in the exported executable (stand alone) game.

argument.title: Game file
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the game file name

function.name: max
function.title: Get Max Value
function.tip: Returns the larger of two values

function.name: min
function.title: Get Min Value
function.tip: Returns the smaller of two values

function.name: moveto
function.title: Move Pen To
function.tip: Move Event Actor pen to given coordinates

function.name: openUrl
function.title: Open Internet Page
function.tip: Open the given url in the system browser

function.name: pow
function.title: Power Function
function.tip: Calculates the value of Value 1 raised to the power Value 2

function.name: putpixel
function.title: Draw Pixel
function.tip: Draw a single pixel on Event Actor in (x, y) coordinates using current pen. The current Event Actor must be a canvas actor.

function.name: radtodeg
function.title: Radians to Degrees
function.tip: Convert an angle from radians to degrees

function.name: rand
function.title: Random
function.tip: Returns a value between 0 and the given max number.

function.name: remapKey
function.title: Redirect Key
function.tip:
Redirect one key to other.
For Example: A game actor shoots with Right Ctrl key. If you want your user to be able to change this control key in the game configuration screen, you use a Key Down event, and use this function with options:
From key: Last Pressed Key To Key: right ctrl
Now, the key pressed by user, will be redirected to Right Ctrl key. Use the redirect key function allows you to keep your original default game key.
The redirected keys will be reseted after using Load Game.

function.name: round
function.title: Round
function.tip: Round a number to nearest integers

function.name: saveVars
function.title: Save Variables
function.tip: Save all variables in the group to the specified file. The file will be saved in the game directory.

argument.title: Group
argument.tip: Select a group previously created in the User Variable panel

function.name: screen_to_actor
function.title: Screen to Actor
function.tip:
Convert from current screen coordinates to actor coordinates.
For Example: Use x = xmouse and y = ymouse to convert the mouse coordinates to the current actor coordinates. So, you will can draw at the correct spot on a canvas actor.

function.name: setPan
function.title: Set Sound Pan
function.tip: Set the pan of sounds (Doesn't work with music). Pan: -1.0 (full left) to 1.0 (full right)

function.name: setVolume
function.title: Set Volume
function.tip: Set the sound or the music volume. Volume: 0.0 (mute) to 1.0 (max volume)

function.name: stopSound
function.title: Stop Sound
function.tip: Stop the sound or music played on the specified channel

function.name: setpen
function.title: Set Pen Color
function.tip: Define the actual pen for the Event Actor

function.name: sign
function.title: Number Signal
function.tip:
Returns number signal.
-1 = negative 1 = positive

function.name: sin
function.title: Sine Function
function.tip: Calculates the sine of given value

function.name: sinh
function.title: Hyperbolic Sine Function
function.tip: Calculates the hyperbolic sine of given value

function.name: sqrt
function.title: Square Root Function
function.tip: Calculates the square root of given value

function.name: strcat
function.title: Append Strings
function.tip: Appends the source string to destination string

function.name: strncat
function.title: Append Part of Strings
function.tip: Appends the source string to destination string, but not more than n characters

function.name: strchr
function.title: Find Character
function.tip: Finds the first occurrence of character in string, or it returns 0 if not found.

function.name: strcmp
function.title: Compare Strings
function.tip:
Compares string 1 and string 2 and returns:
- A negative value if string 1 less than string 2 - Zero if string 1 identical to string 2 - A positive value if string 1 greater than string 2

function.name: strncmp
function.title: Compare Part of Strings
function.tip:
Compares string 1 and string 2, but not more than n characters, and returns:
- A negative value if string 1 less than string 2 - Zero if string 1 identical to string 2 - A positive value if string 1 greater than string 2

function.name: strcpy
function.title: Copy String
function.tip: Copies the source string to destination string.

function.name: strncpy
function.title: Copy Part of String
function.tip: Copies the source string to destination string, but not more than n characters.

function.name: strlen
function.title: Get String Length
function.tip: Get the length of a string.

function.name: tan
function.title: Tangent Function
function.tip: Calculates the tangent of given value

function.name: tanh
function.title: Hyperbolic Tangent Function
function.tip: Calculates the hyperbolic tangent of given value

function.name: vectoradd
function.title: Vector Addition
function.tip: Add vector2 (angle2, magnitude2) to vector1 (angle1, magnitude1) and returns result in vector1 (angles in degrees).

argument.title: Vector 1 angle
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the angle for first vector

argument.title: magnitude
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the magnitude for first vector

argument.title: Vector 2 angle
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the angle for second vector

argument.title: magnitude
argument.errorMsg: Please, enter the magnitude for second vector

function.name: getOwner
function.title: Get Owner Name
function.tip: Returns the device owner name. Use this function to get the owner name of Pocket PC or Smartphone device. Returns an empty string on desktop or if any error happens.

function.name: getHardwareID
function.title: Get Hardware Identification
function.tip:
Returns a string that can uniquely identify the device. Use this function to get a string that can uniquely identify a Pocket PC or Smartphone device. This string can be used in some registration service to protect your game against illegal copies. Some protected smartphones requires you digitally sign your game to execute and use this function.
Returns an empty string on desktop or if any error happens.

function.name: ReleaseActorOwnership
function.title: Release Actor Ownership
function.tip: Release the current owner of the network actor, so other machine can request the ownership. If the local machine is not the owner, the function will be ignored.

argument.title: Actor
argument.tip: Select the actor to release the ownership

function.name: RequestActorOwnership
function.title: Request Actor Ownership
function.tip: Request ownership for the specified network actor. The oldest ownership request will get the ownership. If the network actor already has a owner, the request will fail.

argument.title: Actor
argument.tip: Select the actor to request the ownership

function.name: Connect
function.title: Connect
function.tip: Try connect to the other machine. Fail, if the currnet game aren't running in the remote machine. You don't need this function, if you use the Game Editor server. In a local area network, the other machines will be automatically discovered without need this function. Always after connect to the remote machine the local game will be synchronized with the remote game. Global pointers and dynamic allocated memory in the scripts aren't synchronized.

function.name: NetworkStart
function.title: Network Start
function.tip: Tell the game to use the network at specified port. You don't need this function, if you set the Auto Start Network option in the Game Properties panel.
